players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie's death is a shock. We need to figure out who did this and why."
Bob: "Bob is likely one of us. Let's keep an eye on him."
You: "Let's keep an eye on Bob, but also consider the possibility of a mafioso among us. We can't rule out that Charlie was killed by one of us."
Diana: "I think we should lynch Bob. He's the only one who hasn't been acting suspiciously, and his alibi for Charlie's death is shaky at best."
Bob: "I'm not guilty. I have an alibi for the night Charlie was killed, and I've been acting suspiciously because of my role as mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
